body: Spatially linear system and transform; diffraction theory, partial coherence theory, optical image detection, storage and display, holography.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 320)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 420: Electro-optics: Principles and Devices
